text.section: In this section, "Fund" means the Community Legacy Financial Assistance Fund.
There is a Community Legacy Financial Assistance Fund.
The Fund shall be used to carry out this subtitle.

section.section: The Secretary shall administer the Fund in accordance with this subtitle.
The State Treasurer shall hold and the Comptroller shall account for the Fund.

text.section: The Fund is a continuing, nonlapsing special fund that is not subject to § 7-302 of the State Finance and Procurement Article.
Notwithstanding any other law, the State Treasurer may invest money in the Fund in the same way as money is invested by the State Retirement and Pension System.
In any fiscal year, the Secretary may hold up to 10% of the money in the Fund in reserve for emergency use or urgent projects in accordance with this subtitle.
